minions.name: Venus Man Trap
minions.description: Talent: Search your deck for a minion of power 2 or less and play it here as an extra minion. Shuffle your deck

minions.name: Weed Eater
minions.description: This minion has -2 power on the turn you play it

minions.name: Water Lily
minions.description: Ongoing: Draw a card at the start of each of your turns. Only use one Water Lily's ability each turn

minions.name: Sprout
minions.description: Ongoing: Destroy this card at the start of your turn. You may search your deck for a minion of power 3 or less, and play it here as an extra minion. Shuffle your deck

actions.name: Sleep Spores
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Other players' minions have -1 power here (minimum power 0)

actions.name: Blossom
actions.description: Play up to three extra minions that all have the same name

actions.name: Budding
actions.description: Choose a minion in play. Search your deck for a copy of that card and place it into your hand. Shuffle your deck

actions.name: Choking Vines
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy this minion

actions.name: Deep Roots
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here cannot be moved or returned to your hand by other players' abilities

actions.name: Entangled
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Minions may not be moved or returned to hands from any base where you have a minion. Destroy this card at the start of your turn

actions.name: Overgrowth
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, reduce the breakpoint of this base to 0
